category: news
title: "FIFA 22 release date and machine-learning animations announced in first trailer"
excerpt: "EA Sports has released the first trailer for FIFA 22 and confirmed an October 1 release date. The trailer reveals that the game will make use of what EA is calling HyperMotion technology, which uses machine learning to create bespoke player animations on the fly."
